name: buli-nextjs-project
description: MCP configuration for Buli Next.js website project
rules: This is a Next.js 13+ project using the App Router
Use TypeScript for all new files
Follow Tailwind CSS for styling with mobile-first approach
Use Framer Motion for animations and transitions
Use semantic HTML elements and proper ARIA labels
Implement responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Use Next.js Image component for optimized images
Follow Next.js best practices for performance optimization
Use proper error boundaries and loading states
Implement proper SEO with Next.js metadata API
Use proper TypeScript types and interfaces
Follow the existing component structure and patterns
Use clsx for conditional class names
Implement proper form validation and error handling

keyDirectories: app/ - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
styles/ - Global CSS and Tailwind config
